extension.summary: Smart Search/list management for your Kodi library
extension.description: LibraryGenie provides powerful list management capabilities for your Kodi media library. Create custom lists, organize with folders, search your collection, and sync with Kodi favorites. Features include hierarchical folder organization, universal context menus, quick-add functionality, import/export capabilities, and (alpha/invite) AI-powered search integration. Access via Video Add-ons for lists or Programs for search tools.
extension.disclaimer: This addon supplies NO videos. Requires network access for optional (alpha/invite) AI search features.
